content: BikeHive

BikeHive provides secure bike parking for commuters who need a place to store their bikes while they work. Users can easily reserve a spot online and access it with a unique code. The parking is monitored around the clock, and there are cameras and security personnel on site.
Online booking, secure access codes, 24-hour monitoring, security personnel, CCTV
Parkiteer, Bikeep, CycleSafe
BikeHive's focus on 24-hour monitoring and security personnel sets it apart from competitors who only offer CCTV.
BikeBox

BikeBox is a modular, secure bike parking system that can be customized to fit any space. It can be installed inside or outside, and it can accommodate any number of bikes. The system is weatherproof and made of durable materials, ensuring that bikes are protected from theft and the elements.
Modular design, weatherproof, customizable, durable, secure
Velogic, CycleSafe, BikeVault
BikeBox's modular design and ability to fit any space sets it apart from competitors who offer fixed-size solutions.
BikeSafe

BikeSafe is a mobile app that connects bike commuters with businesses that offer secure bike parking. Users can search for parking locations near their workplace and easily reserve a spot in advance. Partner businesses get increased foot traffic and a reputation for being bike-friendly.
Mobile app, online booking, map search, user reviews, partner programs
Parkiteer, Bikeep, CycleSafe
BikeSafe's focus on partnering with businesses to offer secure parking sets it apart from competitors who only offer standalone parking solutions.
BikeGuard

BikeGuard is a portable, personal bike lock that provides a high level of security for commuters on the go. The lock is made of hardened steel and is resistant to cutting, drilling, and picking. It is also lightweight and easy to carry, making it perfect for commuters who need to park their bike in multiple locations throughout the day.
Portable, high security, lightweight, durable, easy to carry
Kryptonite, ABUS, OnGuard
BikeGuard's focus on portability and ease of use sets it apart from competitors who offer heavier, less portable locks.
pain_point_description: many commuters do not have access to secure bike parking, which can make it difficult to safely store their bikes during the workday
